entry.title: TryHackMe - Internal
entry.summary: Intenal is a hard difficulty penetration testing challenge created by TheMayor. Enumeration Lets start our nmap scan and see what ports are open and what services are running on these ports. nmap scan result: Starting Nmap 7.91 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2021-04-08 19:18 PKT Nmap scan report for 10.10.94.39 (10.10.94.39) Host is up (0.49s latency). entry.title: Hacky-Holidays. A Tale of Saving The Holidays

link.title: Hacky-Holidays. A Tale of Saving The Holidays

entry.summary: Assalam-o-Alaikum & Hello Folks! I hope you are doing well. Today I am here with the detailed writeup of a ctf organized by Hackerone which started in 2nd week of December 2020. It was a 12 days long CTF called Hacky-Holiday. There were total of 12 different challenges all focused on Web Applications. Each day a new challenge was available to solve. Lets get started: Day 01 Information ...

entry.title: CTF-Red @ BsidesIslamabad-2020 - Pakistan's first ever Bsides

link.title: CTF-Red @ BsidesIslamabad-2020 - Pakistan's first ever Bsides

entry.summary: Assalam-o-Alaikum folks! I hope you guys are safe and sound in this pandemic. BsidesIslamabad-2020 was the first ever Bsides cyber security conference of Pakistan, conducted on November 7th-8th 2020. For those who don’t know what Bsides is: BSides is a community-driven framework for building events for and by information security community members. BsidesIslamabad had a lot of amazing sp...
